metadata.title: CVE-2022-48712 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()Current code does not fully takes care of krealloc() error case, whichcould lead to silent memory corruption or a kernel bug.  This patchfixes that.Also it cleans up some duplicated error handling logic from variousfunctions in fast_commit.c file.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
